title: Validate internal headers are not leaked through RBI DLP/TSS
custom_steps:
Enable RBI along with DLP content inspection.

Create RBI policy with Travel category.

Access https://www.belgiantrain.be/n

Access https://rbi-webtest-next.netskope.io/src/php/irpPost.php

Refresh the page.

Checked proxy logs and make sure internal headers are not leaked to actual server.
custom_expected: Checked proxy logs and make sure internal headers are not leaked to actual server.
